headline: BD Board Declares Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced it has declared a quarterly dividend of $1.04 per common share, payable on September 30, 2025 to holders of record on September 8, 2025. The indicated annual dividend rate is $4.16 per share.
